text: Mattia De Marchi (born 3 June 1991 in Mirano) is an Italian former professional cyclist. ==Major results== ;2015 :1st Stage 4 Okolo Jižních Čech :9th Overall Tour of Małopolska ;2016 :1st GP Kranj :1st Stage 4 Tour of China I ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male cyclists
title: Mattia De Marchi
